entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 5.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
